entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He has taken trouble to get to know Harry, indicating a close relationship between them.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who has discovered it was in his power to stop the death of others. He is known for not letting anyone else die for him.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a dark wizard and the main antagonist of the story. He knows that Harry would not let anyone else die for him.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of Harry's friends who has died in the Great Hall, forcing their way back into Harry's mind's eye.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a werewolf and one of Harry's teachers at Hogwarts. He has died in the Great Hall, forcing their way back into Harry's mind's eye.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is a Metamorphmagus and one of Harry's friends who has died in the Great Hall, forcing their way back into Harry's mind's eye.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's best friends. He and Hermione would know what needed to be done after Dumbledore's death.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's best friends. She and Ron would know what needed to be done after Dumbledore's death.

relationships.description: Dumbledore has taken trouble to get to know Harry, indicating a close relationship between them.
Voldemort knows that Harry would not let anyone else die for him.
Dumbledore wanted Harry to confide in Ron and Hermione, so that if he fulfilled his true destiny a little early, they could carry on.
